description: A light soup to enjoy as a starter or appetiser with a full earthy flavour.
keywords: Potato soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Potato, Leek & Kale Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot to a medium heat with the canola oil. Cook the leek, garlic and onion and fry up for 5 minutes while tossing.
Add the potatoes and fry up for a further 5 minutes while mixing. Add the vegetable stock and kale and allow to simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and hand blend to your desired consistency before serving.
